name: Arkanoid Reblocked
overview: Arkanoid Reblocked features 38 Videogame related levels and a playtime of roundabout one hour. The difficulty is quite fair so it’s suitable to play it with your kids or your non-pro-gamer-friends too. This little hack was developed while creating an editor for the game called ArkanEdit. Arkanoid Reblocked was done by: - Hacking: Svambo - Editor Coding: Dom aka Doke - Graphic Decompression: ManakoDE. - Level Design: Poe, ffmcloud, Svambo and Dom aka Doke. - Advice & Support: Sportklaus, Micah, Bredator and Krischan.
